solver.search.solution.ISolutionRecorder

  • Packages that use ISolutionRecorder 
    Package Description
    solver
    A package devoted to Solver and resolution tools.
    solver.search.solution

    • Uses of ISolutionRecorder in solver.search.solution

      Classes in solver.search.solution that implement ISolutionRecorder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllSolutionsRecorder
      Class to record all solutions found during the resolution process
      class  BestSolutionsRecorder
      Class to store best solutions found.
      class  LastSolutionRecorder
      Recorder for the last (presumably best) solution found so far The Solution object is updated on each solution
      class  ParetoSolutionsRecorder
      Class to store the pareto front (multi-objective optimization).
